title: TreasureDAO 生态系统重点项目盘点：Trove、Magicswap、Bridgeworld......
author: defioasis
summary:
Chainfeeds 导读：

Arbitrum 生态链游 The Beacon 的突然爆火，让其背后游戏孵化的 TreasureDAO 生态也受到了市场的关注。数据显示，TreasureDAO 生态周活跃地址在近期达到了近一年的新高，达到将近 2 万个。

文章来源：

https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/upXAZQIiaxyDFVZtkEPr_Q

文章作者：

defioasis

观点：

defioasis：1）Trove：TreasureDAO 生态的主要 NFT 交易市场，平台 NFT 价格以以太坊和 MAGIC 计价，未来将引入开放和无需许可的项目上市模式；2）Magicswap：TreasureDAO 生态的主要 DEX，目前只上线了 Magic/Gfly 和 Magic/ELM 两个交易对；3）Bridgeworld：游戏平台，构成 TreasureDAO 基础经济层，将其展开可作为该生态链接其他游戏的重要结构；4）Smolverse：原生 NFT 项目，目前社区成员为 3 万名；

内容来源

defioasis：5）Tales of Elleria：链游，最初是 BSC 开发，社区投票后迁移至 Arbitrum；6）The Beacon：Free to Play 动作角色扮演游戏，目前已经开发了单人对战、多人对战、房屋系统，未来会推出单人 PvE 和合作 PvE 模式；7）BattleFly：实验性 PvP 战略游戏，主要奖励为 MAGIC，来自市场佣金、玩家对战费用及 NFT 销售；8）The Lost Donkeys：基于 PFP 与 GameFi 相融合的项目，当前有超过 8000 个 Lost Donkey NFT 被铸造，地板价为 0.045E；

内容来源

defioasis：9）Toadstoolz：模拟生活游戏，NFT 总量为 8888 枚，铸造免费但仅限于官方名单上的地址；10）Knights Of The Ether：奇幻题材 PvE 卡牌对战游戏；11）LifeVerse：模拟人生游戏，当前单个 Seed of Life 地板价为 100 MAGIC；12）Lost SamuRise：基于派系的策略游戏，各派系在 SamuRise 中组织起来，进行资源战争，获胜的派系将会获得成为幕府的权利；13）Realm：植根于 GameFi 的世界建设和探索游戏，用户数量约 5000 人，当前已产出 15.2 万个 NFT，燃烧将近将近 12 万个。

title: 【长推】以 UniPass 为例解析账户抽象概念及智能钱包设计思路
author: Jason Chen
summary:
Chainfeeds 导读：

CA 相较于 EOA 的优势在于可以实现更复杂的业务逻辑及更加安全。但其依然没有解决用户使用门槛的问题，而账户抽象的理念就是继续以 CA 为钱包载体，但尽量弱化 EOA 的必要性，其实就是在用户和 CA 之间添加一层「代理」帮助用户完成「触链」过程。

文章来源：

https://twitter.com/jason_chen998/status/1602271047356596224

文章作者：

Jason Chen

观点：

Jason Chen：UniPass 创建的账号会自动在链上为用户部署一套智能合约，与该账户相关的数据和逻辑将保存在合约中，而 Gas 费是由 relayer 支付，relayer 还可以自己决定付费策略。UniPass 还有一个重要特性是社交恢复，它可以设置监护人，当账户因为一些问题无法使用时，可以使用社交恢复重置账户。

title: 我们为什么需要现实资产代币化？
author: 张韡武
summary:
Chainfeeds 导读：

我们需要代币化最直接的理由是效率，通过消除由系统和市场产生的障碍和摩擦，我们将体验一个更加高效的经济系统。

文章来源：

https://mirror.xyz/0xCDE42308896Cf05b590276d47a324A93379F9104/q85c39qWGnY26SKYD1ezzSdrRFysiN-e8fGtmvIMi_8

文章作者：

张韡武

观点：

张韡武：代币化将克服集成技术限制：以银行为例，代币可以可以无限组合，而代币化则可以提供一个更加高效、可访问的基础银行系统，可以实现基于 MOAT 银行系统所无法实现的信任、互操作性、隐私和安全；

内容来源

张韡武：代币化可以消除市场创新的摩擦阻碍：目前开发人员设计的软件按照封闭的参数运行且不向市场开放，通过建立围绕可组合和代币化的权利的应用，我们的设计思维会从「我需要一个应用程序启动我的汽车。」变成「我需要将我的汽车权利代币化，这样我就可以通过第三方租赁获取增量收入。」

内容来源

张韡武：可以代币化的实体经济领域：1）智能设备；2）个人时间：是将个人服务有效捆绑至第三方计划和集成产品中的关键；3）订阅服务：订阅代币可以集成至各个网站而使所有者无需单独付费；4）特权代币：例如持有者可以拍卖一个小时的投资顾问推介商品的时间；5）服务兑换代币；6）产品所有权代币：代币持有者能够随时访问服务，并使转售或出租过程变得更加容易。

title: 【英文长推】解析 Arbitrum 衍生品协议 GMX 商业模式：如何保护零售 LP？
author: Alex @ Breakpoint
summary:
Chainfeeds 导读：

本文在分析 GMX 交易后发现 GMX 订单流毒性非常轻微，GMX 显然在零售 LP 和零售交易者之间找到了一个平衡点，那么它究竟实施了哪些机制让收益的天平向 LP 倾斜呢？

文章来源：

https://twitter.com/thiccythot_/status/1602298856695562240

文章作者：

Alex @ Breakpoint

观点：

Alex @ Breakpoint：1）GMX 依靠预言机引导价格发现，提高了本地价格发现的效率；2）GMX 通过需要两笔交易完成交易减轻套利者对预言机更新的前置操作；3）GMX 的交易费用较高；4）营销活动及有效的推荐机制吸引了稳定的交易者，并将交易者和套利者区分开。【原文为英文】

内容来源

Alex @ Breakpoint：是否应该买入 GMX？有三个问题需要考虑：1）零售交易量往往会随着叙事和激励措施的改变而迅速改变，流动性过剩是 DeFi 行业一个普遍现象；2）黑客攻击及可扩展性：通过 CEX 以增量中立的方式操纵预言机价格以攻击 GMX 的成本过高，而为了防止机构级别参与者攻击 GMX，GMX 以可扩展性为代价引入了更严格的 OI 限制，但 OI 限制在 AUM 的 30% 至 40% 之间意味着资本效率低下；3）Arbitrum 空投：虽然目前尚不清楚 Arbitrum 代币空投激励措施，但在 100 亿估值中，2% 的空投就意味着 Arbitrum 交易者可能获得 2 亿美元的利润。【原文为英文】

title: 7 大稳定币脱锚风险解析：USDT、DAI、FRAX......
author: Biteye
summary:
Chainfeeds 导读：

稳定币具有不同的种类、机制和市场地位，本文选取了市值前 7 的稳定币进行权衡分析，包括公链分布、锚定机制、潜在风险等方面。

文章来源：

https://mirror.xyz/0x30bF18409211FB048b8Abf44c27052c93cF329F2/Dqpv27nvjz3XFCD_7zYe-pZz8tJqBIdoOMaE1JoYPuk

文章作者：

Biteye

观点：

0xHankester：1）USDT 流通于 Tron、以太坊、BSC、Solana 等 61 条公链，Tron 和以太坊上份额最大，锚定机制上 USDT 与 USD 1:1 兑换 ；2）USDC：在以太坊、Solana、Avalanche、Tron 等 59 条公链流通，以太坊份额达 83.7%，锚定机制上发行方足额资金储备；3）BUSD 流通于 33 条公链，以太坊份额达 77.96%，锚定机制上发行方进行足额资金储备；

内容来源

0xHankester：4）DAI 在以太坊、Polygon、BSC 等 40 条公链流通，在以太坊上的份额达 88.33%，发行机制上是用户通过 Maker 协议超额抵押资产而铸造，当 DAI 低于 1 美元时，其铸造数量根据抵押物美元资产确定，高于 1 美元时，MakerDAO 提供存款机制鼓励锁仓，其创始人 Rune Christensen 于 2022 年 8 月 28 日提议允许 DAI 与美元脱钩；

内容来源

0xHankester：5）FRAX：在以太坊、Arbitrum 等 33 条公链流通，以太坊上份额达 92.89%。用户向 Frax 注入 1 美金的抵押物可以铸造 1 枚 FRAX，用户对 Frax 充满信心时，Frax 倾向于降低目标抵押率以铸造更多 FRAX 进入市场流通，反之相反；6）USDP：由 Paxos 发行的抵押稳定币，目前仅在以太坊和 BSC 上流通，以太坊份额占据 99.68%；7）TUSD：由 TrustToken 公司发行，在 Tron、以太坊、BSC 等 10 条公链上流通，Tron、以太坊上的份额分别为 49.8% 及 33.57%。

title: 【长推】Bitcoin Core 版本号研究：有哪些有趣的事实？
author: Jeffrey Hu
summary:
Chainfeeds 导读：

Bitcoin Core 版本号在 0.21.1 后直接变到了 22.0，是版本方案发生了变化吗？本文在对 Bitcoin Core 版本号进行研究后发现了一些有意思的东西。

文章来源：

https://twitter.com/hu_zhiwei/status/1602510896718544896

文章作者：

Jeffrey Hu

观点：

Jeffrey Hu：软件版本的编号目前比较主流在用的有 SemVer（语义化版本）和 CalVer（日历化版本）两种。CalVer 是基于版本发布日期进行版本命名的，而 SemVer 则一般包括 3 位数字，分别代表大版本号（有公开的 API 有非兼容的变化）、小版本号（向后兼容的 API 变化）及补丁（有一些向后兼容的 bug 修订）。

内容来源

Jeffrey Hu：Bitcoin Core 版本号采用的是从 SemVer 衍生出来的一个方案，主要是共识规则等和传统软件有比较大的差别，在姚翔老师考古当时讨论后发现，并没有什么戏剧性的变化和里程碑，只是删除了一个多余的零。

内容来源

Jeffrey Hu：Bitcoin Core 版本首位数字虽然「清零」了，但我个人非常喜欢以 0 开头的软件版本编号，因为可以感到一种谦虚谨慎的态度。当然这种类似强迫症的版本习惯并不独有，有些软件坚持不选择 1.0，甚至包括像 0.999999999 这种带有恶搞性质的版本号。

title: 以太坊 Layer2 之争，Optimistic Rollups 与 ZK Rollups 谁会是最终赢家？
author: 蓝狐笔记
summary:
Chainfeeds 导读：

Optimistic Rollup 在未来 2 至 3 年内将占据重要角色，甚至存在较大可持续性，如果能抓住时间窗口，未必会输给当前的 ZK Rollup 项目。

文章来源：

https://mirror.xyz/0xC36051E2bb2128c18B6E16e5013355A7D950b3F5/GZO7x2Y-xp07FSXVZyu3S2AesrkBRUTmnyMW6z0dsNc

文章作者：

蓝狐笔记

观点：

蓝狐笔记：1）先发优势及网络效应：由于跟 EVM 兼容，Optimism 和 Arbitrum 这些 Optimistic Rollup 类项目已经初步获得了大量支持，有一定规模性效应。且随着后续 EIP-4844 和 danksharding 的实施，早期 Optimistic Rollup 项目的费用方面可能会低于 ZK Rollup 类项目；

内容来源

蓝狐笔记：2）ZK Rollup 是数学证明，虽然存在安全上的优势，但其时间效率上存在劣势，其技术成熟仍需要时间，这就给了 Optimistic Rollup 项目难得的时间窗口；3）在日交易数量规模较小时，Optimistic Rollup 项目有费用优势，且按照目前或未来较长一段时间内的交易量级别，早期 Optimisitic Rollup 可能有优势，且后续两者的费用差距可能也没有想象中大；

内容来源

蓝狐笔记：4）由于 Optimistic Rollup 项目早期获得了开发者、用户等社区支持，一旦技术成熟，Optimistic Rollup 项目可以利用其网络和生态的优势持续迭代，也可以向 ZK Rollup 技术演进。

title: 解读加密领域的美林时钟模型：周期分析和品种选择
author: Huobi Research
summary:
Chainfeeds 导读：

随着加密生态越来越丰富，我们需要新的投资工具来对整个领域进行周期分析。本文对在传统金融领域中的美林时钟模型进行了研究，并分析了加密行业在美林时钟分析框架中应处的位置，以及当前时点属于美林时钟的哪个阶段以及当前的最优资产配置。

文章来源：

https://medium.com/huobi-research/%E7%BE%8E%E6%9E%97%E6%97%B6%E9%92%9F%E6%A8%A1%E5%9E%8B%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6-7bcedc30c225

文章作者：

Huobi Research

观点：

Huobi Research：美林时钟模型是美林公司于 2004 年提出的宏观经济分析和大类资产配置模型。它以产出缺口和 CPI 数据为衡量经济增长和物价水平的两大指标，通过对美国自 1970 年以来的数据进行分析，发现可以将经济循环划分为四个周期，这些周期相继出现并构成一个完整的循环。并且可以根据时钟理论推导和数据验证，给出各个周期内最优的大类资产配置。

内容来源

Huobi Research：我们借鉴股票类型的划分方法将加密货币分为防御型币种和周期型币种，其中周期型币种又可分为长期成长型币种和短期题材型币种。按照美林时钟的分析框架，发现在当前通缩期的时点下，优选 BTC、LTC 等防御型币种和 ETH、UNI、MATIC 等长期成长型币种。

creator: SubQuery Network
title: SubQuery Expands Indexing Support in Cosmos with OKC (OKX Chain) Integration
content:encoded:
SubQuery’s goal has always been to provide fast and efficient indexing to the widest variety of chains possible. Today we’re proud to announce we’ve started supporting another Cosmos chain: OKC (OKX Chain)!

OKC (OKX Chain) is an EVM-compatible L1 built on Cosmos with a focus on true interoperability (IBC) and maximized performance. At high scalability, developers can build and scale with low gas fees. The OKC ecosystem and infrastructure, including the all-in-one multi-chain Web3 interface, enables a seamless experience for both developers and users.

SubQuery’s flexible, fast, open, and decentralised data indexing solution provides developers with the tools needed to easily organise and query on-chain data for their protocol and applications. Abstracting the backend, SubQuery provides a custom API and lets developers focus on product development and user experience rather than building their own indexing solutions.

Nicholas Soong, the Director of OKX Chain Ecosystem Development in APAC, said: “Subquery’s decentralized data indexing infrastructure will increase the efficiency in which developers can develop their products on OKC. This fits the ethos in which we are looking to build our chain upon and we are excited to have Subquery on-board within our ever-growing ecosystem.”

OKC will benefit from the full SubQuery experience, including the open-source SDK, tools, documentation, developer support, and other benefits developers receive from the SubQuery ecosystem.

Additionally, OKC is accommodated by SubQuery’s managed service, which provides enterprise-level infrastructure hosting and handles over 400 million requests each day.

Sam Zou, the Founder and CEO of SubQuery, said: “SubQuery is a fundamental piece of web3 infrastructure that will now be supporting yet another Cosmos chain, OKC (OKX Chain). OKC developers will benefit from our fast, flexible and universal blockchain indexing toolkit that is designed to make their lives easier. We can’t wait to see all of the exciting dApps that will be built on OKC with the power of SubQuery.”

SubQuery provides decentralised data indexing infrastructure to developers building applications on multiple layer-1 blockchains. As an open data indexer that is flexible and fast, the open indexing tool helps developers build APIs in hours and quickly index chains with the assistance of dictionaries (pre-computed indices).

Engineered for multi-chain applications, SubQuery’s tools allow developers to organize, store, and query on-chain data for their protocols and applications. SubQuery eliminates the need for custom data processing servers, helping developers focus on product development and user experience.

Now, the open-source SubQuery software-development-kit (SDK) not only supports EVM, WASM and CosmWasm smart contracts, it fully supports the Ethermint EVM implementation, including custom application binary interfaces (ABI’s) and smart contracts.

After establishing itself as the leading data indexing solution on Polkadot, by serving hundreds of millions of queries daily, SubQuery has expanded to serve other Layer-1 blockchains such as the Cosmos ecosystem alongside Algorand, Flare and Avalanche.

Key Resources

  • Developer documentation (follow the ETH API based docs and adapt Cronos to OKX Chain)
  • Getting started project (Github)
  • Discord community (including technical support)

About OKC

OKC (OKX Chain) is an EVM-compatible L1 built on Cosmos with a focus on true interoperability (IBC) and maximized performance. At high scalability, developers can build and scale with low gas fees. The OKC ecosystem and infrastructure, including the all-in-one multi-chain Web3 interface, enables a seamless experience for both developers and users.

Website | Discord | Telegram | Twitter

About SubQuery

SubQuery is a blockchain developer toolkit facilitating the construction of Web3 applications of the future. A SubQuery project is a complete API to organise and query data from Layer-1 chains. Currently servicing Polkadot, Avalanche, Algorand, Cosmos and Flare projects, this data-as-a-service allows developers to focus on their core use case and front-end without wasting time building a custom backend for data processing activities. In the future, the SubQuery Network intends to replicate this scalable and reliable solution in a completely decentralised manner.

​​Linktree | Website | Discord | Telegram | Twitter | Matrix | LinkedIn | YouTube

creator: Cartesi Foundation
title: Welcome to Cartesi: Cynthia, Dandhi, Jathin, Arthur.
content:encoded:
Get to know what skills and experience our 4 newest contributors are bringing to Cartesi.

To lead, support and push Cartesi’s mission to build a better future, we’re thrilled to welcome four new talented individuals to the project. Get to know the newest contributors and why they chose Cartesi as their new home:

Cynthia Rosemarie Gliga, Community Manager

Cynthia is a passionate community builder with an educational background in Communication and PR. She is among one of the first Meta Certified Community Managers in the world and has led various communities and initiatives within the women empowerment space, as well as commercial & merchandise branded communities.

Her immersion in the crypto world since 2018, made her acknowledge that decentralization and multi-platform community building are essential for adapting to modern realities, as communities are becoming an asset in itself.

Previously working for a blockchain marketing agency, Cynthia has been involved in growing and scaling communities for different well-known crypto projects. She understands the decisive role that communities play in supporting blockchain projects to realize their full potential and is excited to help Cartesi achieve this goal!

“A blockchain OS is what will push the decentralization of Web3, by onboarding a wide range of new developers. Computational and content scalability is what will ultimately push the adoption. Pair both and there is no greater mission in the blockchain space! Cartesi is truly a home to what’s next and I aim to be a voice for empowering the community in thriving and accelerating the project’s impact and accomplishments!”

Dandhi Widiadamarrama, Front-End Developer

Dandhi is a versatile Front-end developer with 5+ years experience designing, developing and managing professional websites and internal portals. Focusing on VueJS and React as a stack, has enabled Dandhi to pick up new skills quickly. He also has strong experience with modern web technologies, JavaScript/TypeScript best practices and is an expert in combining the art of UI/UX design with the art of programming.

“Blockchain is here to stay, Cartesi is revolutionizing the whole space and I’m here to join the revolution.”

Jathin Jagannath, Business Ambassador

A developer at heart, Jathin has been working in the blockchain industry for the past 3 years, gaining experience developing L2 blockchain solutions and applications. He has also previously been involved in growing and scaling communities for different crypto startups and is now eager to lend his skills to growing Cartesi adoption and relationships with projects across the thriving Web3 and developer communities across India.

“Cartesi will change the way we look at secure computing applications and enable a smooth transition from Web2 to Web3.”

Arthur Vianna, Solutions Architect Intern

Arthur is finishing his degree in Computer Science and will continue his studies with a Masters. The majority of his professional experience was gained via Scientific Initiation projects during his graduation, focusing on Computer Networks and Blockchain.

He was first introduced to blockchain during a lecture in 2020 — arousing a great curiosity and interest. Since then, blockchain has become a compelling topic of interest and study for Arthur, with a special focus on scalability applications and solutions.

“I believe that the technology developed by Cartesi is a game changer, and I want to learn, participate and contribute with it.”

-

Let’s give a huge welcome to Cynthia, Dandhi, Jathin, Arthur and here’s to the exciting new journey ahead of them. We look forward to seeing how together, we’ll shape the future of Cartesi and advance the Web3 movement for all.

Contribute to Cartesi.

Interested in developing with us? Or want to lend your skillset to strategic growth initiatives to bring Cartesi tech to more people around the world? We’re always looking for collaborative team players! Feel free to contact us on Discord, check our current career openings, or send your resume along with an introduction to our HR e-mail: hr@cartesi.io.

About Cartesi

Cartesi Rollups is a modular execution layer that elevates simple smart contracts to decentralized Linux runtimes. It allows developers to launch highly scalable rollup chains, and code decentralized logic with their favorite languages and software components.

  • Every DApp has its own high-performing rollup chain;
  • No cannibalization of resources from other DApps in Cartesi’s ecosystem;
  • No network gentrification;
  • Enable an entirely new class of DApps that currently cannot run on EVM chains;
  • Preserve the strong security guarantees of the underlying blockchain

Follow Cartesi across official channels:

Telegram Announcements | Telegram | Discord (Development Community) | Reddit | Twitter | Github | StackOverflow | LinkedIn | Facebook | Instagram | Youtube | Cartesi Improvement Proposal (CIP) | Website

Welcome to Cartesi: Cynthia, Dandhi, Jathin, Arthur. was originally published in Cartesi on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

title: 【英文】Bankless：5 个在熊市逆势增长的加密项目
author: Lucas Campbell
summary:
Chainfeeds 导读：

加密货币仍处于熊市，但根据关键的基本绩效指标，当下仍有少数板块和项目正在蓬勃发展。本文对 Lens Protocol、Sound Protocol、Optimism、Arbitrum 和 Rocket Pool 5 个项目近几个月来的数据和增长情况进行了整理。

文章来源：

https://newsletter.banklesshq.com/p/where-crypto-is-still-growing-620

文章作者：

Lucas Campbell

观点：

Lucas Campbell：Lens Protocol 的各项指标均创下历史新高。首先，每月参与度（发帖、评论和转发数）几乎翻了一番，达 37 万次。11 月活跃 profile 数近 40,000 个，较上月增长 59%；Sound Protocol 11 月单月铸造的音乐 NFT 数超 12,000 首，与 4 月创下的记录相比增加 242%。收藏家的数量也在激增，11 月有 1442 名活跃收藏家，独立地址总数达 6500 个。二级市场交易量也从底部出现实质性的上升趋势。【原文为英文】

内容来源

Lucas Campbell：Optimism 每日交易量达 50 万笔，为历史最高水平。网络上的独立地址数也在成倍增加，刚刚突破 200 万个。同时，已部署的经过验证的合约数也创下新高；Arbitrum 每日交易量达 57.5 万笔，独立地址数近 225 万个。就部署的已验证合约数而言，近几个月连续飙升至每天超过 100 份，最高达到单日部署 176 份的峰值。【原文为英文】

内容来源

Lucas Campbell：Rocket Pool 不同关键指标的采用量正在加速增长。主要指标是流通中的 rETH 数量，已经飙升至 15 万 rETH 以上的新高度。作为参考，这个数字在 9 月时还只有 75,000，这意味着 3 个月内总供应量翻了一番。【原文为英文】

creator: Laura Shin
title: How Will the FTX Collapse Affect Silvergate? A Bear and a Bull Debate – Ep. 431
content:encoded:
Ram Ahluwalia, CEO and cofounder of crypto-native investment advisor Lumida, and Marc Cohodes, individual investor and former hedge fund manager, have a heated debate about Silvergate, a crypto-friendly bank that plays a key role in integrating crypto with traditional finance and is currently under scrutiny due to its ties with FTX and Alameda. Both Marc and Ram have a vested interest in Silvergate. Marc is shorting the stock, while Ram is longing it.

Show highlights:

  • why Silvergate plays such a vital role in the movement of money within the crypto industry
  • whether Silvergate runs proper KYC and AML practices
  • whether Silvergate has a $1 billion hole in its balance sheet
  • whether regulators will go after Silvergate as they are doing with FTX
  • why Marc thinks the FTX collapse wouldn’t have happened without Silvergate 
  • whether Silvergate was complicit with FTX’s activities or simply negligent 
  • why Ram believes this case is different from JPMorgan’s involvement with Madoff 
  • what regulatory actions might come in the near future for Silvergate 
  • why Ram thinks regulators will go to “great lengths” to avoid a bank failure
  • what would it take for Ram and Marc to change their minds

 

Take Unchained’s 2022 survey!

title: 5 分钟了解 Optimism 的发展历史与未来方向
author: 0xMoonda（WAGMi Ventures）
summary:
Chainfeeds 导读：

Optimism 在 EVM 兼容方面的进展较为显著，是目前 L2 中唯一实现 EVM 等效的 rollup。本文内容涵盖 Optimism 对以太坊扩容问题的具体解决方案、技术更新与进展、生态发展数据及未来展望。

文章来源：

https://mirror.xyz/0x4d49083EcefCFCC3A13F1DAE46C7f408c104d9fA/QUxqVUp5K7cxyLmDrRAyqVjzhJiTj7Zi5X8jUwzx-Hk

文章作者：

0xMoonda（WAGMi Ventures）

观点：

0xMoonda（WAGMi Ventures）：协议收入：总体呈小幅震荡上升状态。震荡区间逐月攀升，11 月 8 日至 11 日四天出现大幅攀升，最高至 $61.2k 后回落至正常状态；独立地址：呈稳步上升趋势。4 月 27 日由于空投发放新增地址 45.6 万余个，后进入缓慢增长状态。9 月后独立地址阶梯式增长，日均新增从 2.7k 稳步过渡至 10k；

内容来源

0xMoonda（WAGMi Ventures）：日交易量：9 月后日交易量由 126.1k 逐步攀升至 347.1k，上涨约 175%，11 月 9 日日交易量迎来近期高点 492k；日活跃用户：震荡上升。由 9 月初的阶段性低点 8.5k 到 12 月初的 34.8k，增幅 309.4%；TVL：9 月到 10 月间保持在 9 亿美金上下，FTX 事件后出现断崖式下跌，触及 5.17 亿美金，下降 42.55%，目前稳定在 5.56 亿美金左右；

内容来源

0xMoonda（WAGMi Ventures）：链上应用：非原生应用在 TVL 中占比较大，唯一的原生应用 Velodrome 的 TVL 仅占前十应用总 TVL 的 14.64%；项目交互：原生应用 Velodrome、Pika Protocol、Rubicon 交互数量仅占生态内排名前七应用交互总量的 24.87%，说明原生应用用户粘性有待加强，可推测现阶段用户使用 Optimism 主要目的是节约 gas；

内容来源

0xMoonda（WAGMi Ventures）：跨链：截止目前，使用 Optimism 跨链的用户约 27.2 万人，总金额约 44.8 万枚 ETH（折合现价约 5.5 亿美元）；七日内存款人数 10.6 万，跨链金额近 1.1 万枚 ETH。与其它 L2 相比，七日内存款人数排名第一，其余三个维度的数据均为第二；Gas：在众多 L2 协议中，转账费用排名第六，比以太坊 L1 低 83%。Swap 费用排名第四，比以太坊 L1 低 95%。

creator: Karolina Gruszczyk
title: 5 tips to make Revolut Sales recruiters love your CV
content:encoded:
In a market where there are around 15,000 potential sales candidates in the UK alone*, it can be overwhelming trying to stand out. A strong sales CV should attract instant attention, be scannable, and engage your audience quickly. Here’s a few things we love at Revolut:

Brush up your pitch

As a salesperson, you can understand the importance of a good introduction. Put together a summary of your skills, your goals, and align your attributes with the role you’re applying for. This doesn’t need to be too long, just enough to give an initial impression and make the hiring manager or recruiter want to read on.

Be data-driven

Sales roles lend themselves well to performance metrics so take advantage of this and provide highlights of each of your roles. We want to see concrete evidence of your abilities. Percentage of target achieved, clients acquired, revenue generated and/or portfolio value are just a few potential metrics that are eye-catching and scannable for recruiters and hiring managers.

Don’t be afraid of the humble brag

Whether you were the top salesperson of the year, or generated the most revenue in a period of time, now’s the time to say so. Mention career wins, accolades, achievements - a good track record is invaluable to us.

Make it clear

It sounds obvious, but a clear format with structured headings makes a CV much more digestible for our recruiters who are reviewing hundreds of resumes on a weekly basis. On average, a recruiter will look at a CV for 6-8 seconds, so make your CV as easy to read as possible.

Be authentic

Show us what you’re truly about. Depending on your level of experience, this may or may not be relevant, but if you’re earlier on in your career, it would be great to see some of your interests whether it’s a particular sport, hobby or activity you enjoy – these can be great indicators of your personality and the kind of person you are.

Whether you're a fresh grad or seasoned professional, your CV needs to highlight your achievements, goals and track record. Sales is competitive and getting a foot in the door is no different.

*LinkedIn Talent Insights

Author: Stephanie Ewin, Recruitment Lead for Sales at Revolut

And once you have your CV refreshed, don't hesitate to share it with Stephanie's team! 👉 Join Revolut Sales 👈

title: Canada Bans Crypto Leverage, Exchanges Must Segregate User Funds
content:encoded:
Crypto exchanges operating in Canada must segregate user funds from operational cash and stop offering leverage to margin traders moving forward.

That’s according to fresh guidelines set by the Canadian Securities Administrators (CSA), an umbrella organization for securities regulators across the region.

Crypto trading platforms will also be required to hold Canada-based users’ assets with an “appropriate” qualified custodian, the CSA said in a Monday statement. Custodians are considered qualified if they’re regulated in Canada, the US or similar jurisdiction.

“Following recent events in the crypto market, the CSA is strengthening its approach to oversight of crypto trading platforms by expanding existing requirements for platforms operating in Canada,” the organization said.

Margin crypto trading will be prohibited to all Canada-based traders, including institutional clients and organizations. Singapore is mulling a similar move for retail investors.

Canada’s new restrictions come around one month after Sam Bankman-Fried’s FTX exchange began unraveling, leading to its bankruptcy.

New FTX CEO John J. Ray testified before Congress on Monday that FTX had commingled user assets with sister trading firm Alameda Research in a bid to generate additional revenue for itself. 

CSA regulators also warned crypto exchanges not to facilitate any cryptocurrency that may be considered a security — a designation which the regulators say could include stablecoins. 

“The CSA is of the view that stablecoins, or stablecoin arrangements, may constitute securities and/or derivatives,” the group said. Crypto exchanges must have established policies and procedures to determine whether the digital assets they list are securities or derivatives.

It is unclear exactly when the new provisions will take effect, though platforms can expect to be contacted individually to discuss the changes. The CSA did not immediately respond to a request for comment.

Jacob Robinson, lawyer at Canadian law firm McCarthy Tétrault, tweeted that the new rules may have a large impact on local crypto exchanges moving forward.

“This categorization could lead to a major delisting of stables on Canadian exchanges,” Robinson said. “Closest to a definitive statement we’ve seen [regarding] stablecoins as securities/derivatives.”

Last September, the Ontario Securities Commission (OSC), Canada’s largest financial regulator, outright banned crypto exchanges operating locally from touching leading stablecoin tether — although it hasn’t explicitly stated whether it deems USDT a security.

title: CFTC Must Serve Ooki DAO Founders: California Judge
dc:creator: Alys Key
content: A California court ruled that the CFTC needs to notify a specific token holder within the Ooki DAO rather than the entire DAO.
contentSnippet: A California court ruled that the CFTC needs to notify a specific token holder within the Ooki DAO rather than the entire DAO.
